item.title: ‘Father Mother Sister Brother’ Review: A Starry Cast Excels in Jim Jarmusch’s Charming Triplicate Portrait of Familial (Mis)Understanding
item.description: The song “Spooky,” that catchy little anthem about being befuddled by love, plays twice in Jim Jarmusch’s lovely triptych melancomedy “Father Mother Sister Brother.” Its

item.title: ‘Father Mother Sister Brother’ Review: Cate Blanchett and Adam Driver in Jim Jarmusch’s Funny, Tender, Astutely Observed Jewel of a Family Triptych
item.description: Tom Waits, Indya Moore and Charlotte Rampling are also part of the ensemble in three minor-key stories about adult siblings and their parents, set in the Northeast U.S., Dublin and Paris.

item.title: Family Relations Get Toasted and Roasted in Teaser for Jim Jarmusch’s ‘Father Mother Sister Brother’
item.description: Directed by Jarmusch from his own script, the film stars Tom Waits, Adam Driver, Mayim Bialik, Charlotte Rampling, Cate Blanchett, Vicky Krieps, Sarah Greene, Indya Moore, Luka Sabbat and Françoise Le

item.title: Family Relations Get Toasted and Roasted in Teaser for Jim Jarmusch’s ‘Father Mother Sister Brother’

item.title: Mayim Bialik’s Webby Award-Winning Podcast ‘Breakdown’ Partners With Impact Theory
item.description: The podcast, which Bialik hosts with Jonathan Cohen, will join Impact Theory’s network in a deal designed to “fuel strategic growth” through partnerships and advertising opportunities.
